articles.description: SPIDER-MAN 3 Star Tom Holland Reveals Why He Had To Put His Foot Down With Marvel Studios Producers
articles.content: Tom Holland had to leap straight from Uncharted to Spider-Man 3 last year, and that posed a problem for Marvel Studios. The actor's hair had been cut for his role as intrepid explorer Nathan Drake, b… [+1368 chars]

articles.author: Chris Kitching
articles.title: TikTok influencer who put Gorilla Glue in hair cuts off ponytail as scalp 'still burns' - Mirror Online
articles.description: TikTok user Tessica Brown, from Violet, Louisiana in the US, mistakenly used super-strength Gorilla Glue instead of hairspray and has been left with rock-hard hair for more than a month
articles.content:
A TikTok influencer who sprayed her hair with Gorilla Glue says she is still in agony and has had her ponytail hacked off in a desperate bid to ease her suffering. 
Tessica Brown, 40, mistakenly use… [+5106 chars]

articles.author: Rob Picheta, CNN
articles.title: Elton John and Michael Caine star in video encouraging Brits to get vaccine - CNN
articles.description: Elton John and Michael Caine have released a video encouraging Britons to get vaccinated for Covid-19, as the country prepares to widen its rollout to younger adults.
